about_the_game:
Ultimate Penalty is a challenging soccer game that takes the classic penalty shootout to a whole new level. In this game, players not only have to face the goalkeeper's defense to get the highest score possible.

The game uses an innovative multiplier reward mechanism, and each goal will be multiplied by the current reward multiplier. Players are required to strike a balance between accuracy and timing, adding tension and strategy to the game.

Simple but deep control

Using the space bar to control the horizontal and vertical shooting positions, the seemingly simple control system actually contains a high technical depth. A perfect shot requires precise timing and stable nerves.

Immersive game atmosphere

The game takes place in a bustling football stadium, accompanied by dynamic audience reactions and real environmental sound effects. The enthusiastic audience and tense atmosphere make every goal feel rewarding.

Progressive challenge system

As the score increases, the goalkeeper's reaction ability gradually improves, bringing greater challenges to the player. This progressive difficulty design keeps the game fresh and challenging.

Achievement system

Multiple achievement goals are set, such as consecutive goals and high score records, which add extra fun in addition to the pursuit of high scores.

Ultimate Penalty is perfect for all football fans, from casual players to those seeking the ultimate in precision play. The simple control scheme also makes it perfect for competitive play with friends to compare high scores.

The game perfectly blends accessibility and depth, making it an addictive experience that keeps players coming back for "just one more shot". Whether you're a football fan or just looking for an engaging arcade experience, Ultimate Penalty will provide you with endless hours of entertainment.
